note.p: Daughter of Charlotte Myddelton and her husband Robert Biddulph MP (1761-1814) of Cofton Hall, Worcestershire; they took the surname Myddelton Biddulph at their marriage in 1801. Sister of Robert Myddelton Biddulph. Married Charles William Maude in 1849.
Denbighshire, Wales, Anglican baptisms, marriages and burials, 1556–1994 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 May 2022)
Westminster, London, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1558–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 May 2022)
